name: Visible Thoughts: 011
description:
011 of the Visible Thoughts series.

Let's talk clouds. All my life, I've been fascinated by clouds - how they roll across the sky and how swayed they are by their emotions. As if they have their own individual personalities, each cloud stretches over the expanse above, displaying their facets of colours and shapes. Some have a temper, some are tumultuous, some are peaceful, and some are entirely unpredictable. Like humans, they tell their stories through these attitudes and whims. And on the rare occasion, you can catch those extra special ones - the ones that make you feel your heart beat a bit deeper, where your breaths align with the breeze, and you wonder what it'd be like to touch a cloud.
